title: X,y = shap.datasets.california(n_points=1000)-->PicklingError

labels.name: awaiting feedback
labels.description: Indicates that further information is required from the issue creator

body:
code:
"""
import shap
import sklearn

# a classic housing price dataset
X,y = shap.datasets.california(n_points=1000)

X100 = shap.utils.sample(X, 100) # 100 instances for use as the background distribution

# a simple linear model
model = sklearn.linear_model.LinearRegression()
model.fit(X, y)
"""

When I run it, the error:

  File "E:\Anaconda\lib\site-packages\spyder\utils\site\sitecustomize.py", line 705, in runfile
    execfile(filename, namespace)

  File "E:\Anaconda\lib\site-packages\spyder\utils\site\sitecustomize.py", line 102, in execfile
    exec(compile(f.read(), filename, 'exec'), namespace)

  File "C:/Users/pc/Desktop/毕业设计/code/SHAP1.py", line 12, in <module>
    X,y = shap.datasets.california()

  File "E:\Anaconda\lib\site-packages\shap\datasets.py", line 42, in california
    d = sklearn.datasets.fetch_california_housing()

  File "C:\Users\pc\AppData\Roaming\Python\Python36\site-packages\sklearn\utils\validation.py", line 63, in inner_f
    return f(*args, **kwargs)

  File "C:\Users\pc\AppData\Roaming\Python\Python36\site-packages\sklearn\datasets\_california_housing.py", line 145, in fetch_california_housing
    joblib.dump(cal_housing, filepath, compress=6)

  File "C:\Users\pc\AppData\Roaming\Python\Python36\site-packages\joblib\numpy_pickle.py", line 479, in dump
    NumpyPickler(f, protocol=protocol).dump(value)

  File "E:\Anaconda\lib\pickle.py", line 409, in dump
    self.save(obj)

  File "C:\Users\pc\AppData\Roaming\Python\Python36\site-packages\joblib\numpy_pickle.py", line 270, in save
    Pickler.save(self, wrapper)

  File "E:\Anaconda\lib\pickle.py", line 521, in save
    self.save_reduce(obj=obj, *rv)

  File "E:\Anaconda\lib\pickle.py", line 605, in save_reduce
    save(cls)

  File "C:\Users\pc\AppData\Roaming\Python\Python36\site-packages\joblib\numpy_pickle.py", line 284, in save
    return Pickler.save(self, obj)

  File "E:\Anaconda\lib\pickle.py", line 476, in save
    f(self, obj) # Call unbound method with explicit self

  File "E:\Anaconda\lib\pickle.py", line 978, in save_type
    return self.save_global(obj)

  File "E:\Anaconda\lib\pickle.py", line 927, in save_global
    (obj, module_name, name))

PicklingError: Can't pickle <class 'joblib.numpy_pickle.NumpyArrayWrapper'>: it's not the same object as joblib.numpy_pickle.NumpyArrayWrapper

and my joblib version is 1.1.1, shap version is 0.41.0, python version is 3.6.5.
How can I solve this problem?
